post:
Happy American Independence Day, everyone! Hope you all are having a fantastic Wednesday!

I asked some providers if they’d be willing to submit some offers for a little Independence Day Deal thread. I got a few replies, so here they are.

Providers feel free to add new offers to this thread as you see fit.
HostBallers feel free to share other deals or join in on the fun

MXroute.io

To start us off, @Miguel has put forth a tantilizingly sweet mailchannels offer. Some solid plans at rock-bottom prices!

Added some limited stock for MXroute.IO / MailChannels at https://mxroute.io/LET.html#plans
Annually paid plans, for cheap!

SkylonHost.com

Next up are some sweet HALF-OFF VPS deals that you can snatch up in France. Thanks to @FHR for submitting this through.

SkylonHost can offer recurring 50% OFF (packages from 5e per month!) and tripled bandwidth on all our VDS/Semi-dedicated VPS packages (monthly billing cycle only).

What do we offer?
SkylonHost provides high performance DDOS protected KVM VDS - virtual servers with dedicated CPU power. This means you can use all the resources available to your instance 100% of the time, 24/7.
Miners and gamers are welcome.

Location: France

More information available here: https://skylonhost.com/vps-dedicated.html

Specify promo code “Independence” while ordering to get the discount, open a ticket to request the additional bandwidth - mention “LowEndTalk”. Offer valid till stock lasts.

HetrixTools.com

And no deals thread would be complete without our beloved @Andrei giving us a sweet deal on a Hetrix Tools professional monitoring package!

60% OFF Recurring for our Professional Uptime Monitor package.
Just $9.95 $3.98 per month OR $99.95 $39.98 per year for:

  • 20 Uptime Monitors
  • 20 Server Monitors
  • Monitored every minute, around the clock
  • Select 6 out of 12 monitoring locations
  • Extremely precise outage detection
  • Public Status Page - keep your clients always up to date (example)
  • Domain expiration monitoring
  • SSL expiration monitoring
  • Nameservers change monitoring
  • Notification via: Email, SMS, PushBullet, Pushover, Twitter, Slack, Discord, HipChat, PagerDuty, Telegram, and Webhooks

Order the Professional package from our pricing page:
https://hetrixtools.com/pricing/uptime-monitor/
Coupon Code: 4thOfJuly2018
Valid for the first 20 orders and until 8th of July 2018.

Now that we’ve gotten our feet wet, everyone invite your favorite providers to put forth some freedom-inspiring offers. You can catch some more deals over on the LET deals thread as well. Enjoy your 4th, everybody!
